title: MANAGEMENT
description: All management is about ‘What to do?’. Its all about action, execution and doing things right. Its about effectively using three biggest resources of every enterprise - Men, Money, and Materials.

title: STRATEGY
description: All strategy is about ‘When to do?’ and ‘How to do?’. Strategy is planning and designing processes that help achieve the overall long-term aims and goals of an organization.

title: LEADERSHIP
description: All leadership is about ‘Who to do?’ aspect in an organization. Leadership means to lead, motivate and guide individuals and teams in an organization to achieve the desired goals.
